attributes.action: ALL football clubs to ask fans before they agree to move a game for TV purposes?
attributes.background:
To give the football fans of this country some power back! 

Too many times fans see the fixtures and book travel in advance for these games to be rescheduled for TV at short notice …

Either give the fans of the clubs a chance to say no to this, simply TV is put before fans and it’s wrong

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about football fixtures are a matter for The Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
